00004 SEXP CHMfactor_to_sparse(SEXP x)
00005 {
00006     CHM_FR L = AS_CHM_FR(x), Lcp;
00007     CHM_SP Lm;
00008     R_CheckStack();
00009 
00010     /* cholmod_factor_to_sparse changes its first argument. Make a copy */
00011     Lcp = cholmod_copy_factor(L, &c);
00012     if (!(Lcp->is_ll))
00013         if (!cholmod_change_factor(Lcp->xtype, 1, 0, 1, 1, Lcp, &c))
00014             error(_("cholmod_change_factor failed with status %d"), c.status);
00015     Lm = cholmod_factor_to_sparse(Lcp, &c); cholmod_free_factor(&Lcp, &c);
00016     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(Lm, 1/*do_free*/, -1/*uploT*/, 0/*Rkind*/,
00017                               "N"/*non_unit*/, R_NilValue/*dimNames*/);
00018 }

00020 SEXP CHMfactor_solve(SEXP a, SEXP b, SEXP system)
00021 {
00022     CHM_FR L = AS_CHM_FR(a);
00023     SEXP bb = PROTECT(dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(b));
00024     CHM_DN B = AS_CHM_DN(bb), X;
00025     int sys = asInteger(system);
00026     R_CheckStack();
00027 
00028     if (!(sys--))               /* -- align with CHOLMOD defs */
00029         error(_("system argument is not valid"));
00030 
00031     X = cholmod_solve(sys, L, B, &c);
00032     UNPROTECT(1);
00033     return chm_dense_to_SEXP(X, 1/*do_free*/, 0/*Rkind*/,
00034                              GET_SLOT(bb, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00035 }

00037 SEXP CHMfactor_spsolve(SEXP a, SEXP b, SEXP system)
00038 {
00039     CHM_FR L = AS_CHM_FR(a);
00040     CHM_SP B = AS_CHM_SP__(b);
00041     int sys = asInteger(system);
00042     R_CheckStack();
00043 
00044     if (!(sys--))               /* -- align with CHOLMOD defs */
00045         error(_("system argument is not valid"));
00046     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(cholmod_spsolve(sys, L, B, &c),
00047                               1/*do_free*/, 0/*uploT*/, 0/*Rkind*/,
00048                               "", GET_SLOT(b, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00049 }

00059 double chm_factor_ldetL2(CHM_FR f)
00060 {
00061     int i, j, p;
00062     double ans = 0;
00063 
00064     if (f->is_super) {
00065         int *lpi = (int*)(f->pi), *lsup = (int*)(f->super);
00066         for (i = 0; i < f->nsuper; i++) { /* supernodal block i */
00067             int nrp1 = 1 + lpi[i + 1] - lpi[i],
00068                 nc = lsup[i + 1] - lsup[i];
00069             double *x = (double*)(f->x) + ((int*)(f->px))[i];
00070 
00071             for (j = 0; j < nc; j++) {
00072                 ans += 2 * log(fabs(x[j * nrp1]));
00073             }
00074         }
00075     } else {
00076         int *li = (int*)(f->i), *lp = (int*)(f->p);
00077         double *lx = (double *)(f->x);
00078 
00079         for (j = 0; j < f->n; j++) {
00080             for (p = lp[j]; li[p] != j && p < lp[j + 1]; p++) {};
00081             if (li[p] != j) {
00082                 error(_("%d diagonal element of Cholesky factor is missing"), j);
00083                 break;          /* -Wall */
00084             }
00085             ans += log(lx[p] * ((f->is_ll) ? lx[p] : 1.));
00086         }
00087     }
00088     return ans;
00089 }
00090 
00091 SEXP CHMfactor_ldetL2(SEXP x)
00092 {
00093     CHM_FR L = AS_CHM_FR(x); R_CheckStack();
00094 
00095     return ScalarReal(chm_factor_ldetL2(L));
00096 }

00112 CHM_FR chm_factor_update(CHM_FR f, CHM_SP A, double mult)
00113 {
00114     double mm[2] = {0, 0};
00115     mm[0] = mult;
00116     if (!cholmod_factorize_p(A, mm, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, f, &c))
00117         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d of ncol %d"),
00118               c.status, f->minor, f->n);
00119     return f;
00120 }
00121 
00122 SEXP CHMfactor_update(SEXP object, SEXP parent, SEXP mult)
00123 {
00124     CHM_FR L = AS_CHM_FR(object), Lcp;
00125     CHM_SP A = AS_CHM_SP__(parent);
00126     R_CheckStack();
00127 
00128     Lcp = cholmod_copy_factor(L, &c);
00129     return chm_factor_to_SEXP(chm_factor_update(Lcp, A, asReal(mult)), 1);
00130 }
00131 
00132 SEXP CHMfactor_ldetL2up(SEXP x, SEXP parent, SEXP mult)
00133 {
00134     SEXP ans = PROTECT(duplicate(mult));
00135     int i, nmult = LENGTH(mult);
00136     double *aa = REAL(ans), *mm = REAL(mult);
00137     CHM_FR L = AS_CHM_FR(x), Lcp;
00138     CHM_SP A = AS_CHM_SP__(parent);
00139     R_CheckStack();
00140 
00141     Lcp = cholmod_copy_factor(L, &c);
00142     for (i = 0; i < nmult; i++)
00143         aa[i] = chm_factor_ldetL2(chm_factor_update(Lcp, A, mm[i]));
00144     cholmod_free_factor(&Lcp, &c);
00145     UNPROTECT(1);
00146     return ans;
00147 }
